entry.codeblock: This element refers to a non-textual packaging/format of a written work. If someone adapts a woman's book into a opera, a film, a sound recording or a dance, record it here.

<PNONBOOKMEDIA> <BIBCITS ID="">{1,1}</BIBCITS> <DATE annotationId="" CALENDAR="NEWSTYLE" CERTAINTY="CERT" ID="" offsetId="" VALUE="">{1,1}</DATE> <DATERANGE annotationId="" CALENDAR="NEWSTYLE" CERTAINTY="CERT" EXACT="" FROM="" ID="" offsetId="" TO="">{1,1}</DATERANGE> <DATESTRUCT annotationId="" CALENDAR="NEWSTYLE" CERTAINTY="CERT" offsetId="" VALUE="">{1,1}</DATESTRUCT> <EMPH>{1,1}</EMPH>
